definition: to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: This kind of videotape rewinds automatically.
sentences.chinese: 这种录像带能自动倒回。

sentences.english: Please wind the videtape back a little way; I want to see that bit again.
sentences.chinese: 请将录像带退回一点，我想再看看那一部分。
他因非法贩卖录像带而被捕。

sentences.english: I was afraid of what was on that tape.
sentences.chinese: 我真怕看到录像带上的东西。

sentences.english: As I walked into the video store, I saw the Princess Bride playing on a TV there.
sentences.chinese: 而当我走进录像带店，电视上正播着公主新娘呢。

sentences.english: Please find attached a video showing the difference between the two.
sentences.chinese: 请观看随函复寄的录像带，从而找出二者的不同。

sentences.english: His ghoulish moves in the video have been imitated by dancers all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 他在录像带中表演的魔鬼舞被全世界的舞者所效仿。

sentences.english: The archives were filled to the rafters with piles of manually labeled videocassettes.
sentences.chinese: 贴有人工手写标签的录像带堆满了档案柜。

sentences.english: Steven Soderbergh: Sex, Lies, and Videotape.
I immediatly ejected the tape and looked at the label.
sentences.chinese: 我立刻弹出了录像带并且看了看那上面的标签。

sentences.english: If you've taped the meeting, be sure to spot-check the tape.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有会议录像，要抽查录像带。
这些是布克叔叔的录像带吗？

sentences.english: The good video is always rented out.
sentences.chinese: 好看的钉耽草肥禺堵碴瑟厂鸡录像带总是被借走。

sentences.english: This new video tape from Al-Quida invites Americans to convert to Islam.
sentences.chinese: 基地组织的新录像带引诱美国人改信伊斯兰教。

definition: variant of 錄像|录像[lu4 xiang4]
variant of 錄像|录像[lu4 xiang4]
